title: Buy used cars
items: Engine - Check for leaks, oil level, head gasket condition and exhaust smoke
Gearbox and clutch - Feel and listen to the smoothness of the gear change, and test the clutch biting point
Bodywork - Check the outside and underneath â€“ a torch is useful for the latter
Wheels and tyres - Tread depth, rubber condition and makes of each tyre
Interior - Check the boot, dash (for mileage and warning lights) and electronics thoroughly
Test drive - Drive it until you have checked everything you want to
Documents - Legal documents of the car
